PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-17262012-12-13,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNFB-PIPSC - Administrative and Foreign Service category and the Scientific and Professional category ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the renewal of the COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT between the NATIONAL FILM BOARD AND THE PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA regarding the Administrative and Foreign Service category and the Scientific and Professional category. This agreement is for a term of three (3) years from July 1, 2011 to June 30, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
